text: this is all that's now visible of the
ferry the hull jutting out of the water
the rest of the craft is submerged teams
of rescuers have been frantically trying
to find survivors using floodlights and
flares dive teams try to enter the ship
overnight but were prevented by strong
currents this footage shows rescue
efforts before the vessel went down
among those found was this six year old
girl still in shock after her ordeal the
fate of her family is still unknown
shielding his face the captain of the
ferry who's been questioned by the
police expressed regret for what had
happened I am really sorry I am deeply
ashamed I cannot put it into words
distraught relatives now want answers
about what happened some reports say the
ferry went off course but none of this
has been confirmed those who survived
have been describing their ordeal I held
a handrail and moved toward the right
side of the ferry to ride a helicopter
as water kept coming in trash cans were
floating and water came up to my neck
exactly why the ferry sank remains a
mystery conditions at sea were calm and
visibility was good a full investigation
will come later but for now all efforts
are focused on finding the missing
passengers Jayne Frances Kelly BBC News
